name: DeadSnakeTemplate
description: Template for Telegram userbot using tgSnake based on GramJS

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: This is exactly the same with 'App name' field on upper of this page, used to identify your userbot app.

STRING_SESSION.description: Run generator.js or any other services to get one.

CHAT_LOG.description: ChatID of the Log group, used to send error logs.

LOGGER.description: Log level (none, info, warn, error, debug).

ACCOUNT_NAME.description: Name to be displayed at .alive message.

BANNER_IMAGE.description: Image to be displayed at .alive message, you can pass it with direct image url link or image path.
